Class StructHelper

  • java.lang.Object

    This utility class contains helper methods for structs.

    • Method Detail

      • isTargetOfAssignment

        public static boolean isTargetOfAssignment(StructIdentifierNode node)
        Check if the given structIdentifierNode is used as the target of an assignment. The target of an assignment is the left hand side value (assignment: target = source)
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        true if the node is target of an assignment.

      • getInternalBaseType

        public static java.lang.Object[] getInternalBaseType(Type type,
                                     ASTNode node)
        Get the base type of the given derived type. The base type of an ArrayType is the inner most type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to get the base type for.
        node - The node
        Returns:
        An array with the type and the node

      • getBaseType

        public static Type getBaseType(Type type,
               ASTNode node)
        Get the base type of the given derived type. The base type of an ArrayType is the inner most type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to get the base type for.
        node - The node
        Returns:
        The base type

      • getOuterStruct

        public static ASTNode getOuterStruct(ASTNode node)
        Get the outer most struct identifier node
        Parameters:
        node - the node to use
        Returns:
        the outer most struct identifier node

      • isOuterMostDimension

        public static boolean isOuterMostDimension(StructIdentifierNode node)
        Check if the given node is the outer most dimension of a struct.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        true if the given node is the outer most dimension of a struct.

      • fieldExists

        public static boolean fieldExists(StructType type,
                  java.lang.String index)
        Check if the ArrayType has a field named index
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check
        index - the fieldname of the struct
        Returns:
        true if the field exists
